casebody.data:
COMPREHENSIVE CARE CORPORATION, Appellant,
v.
Dr. Jerry KATZMAN; Peggy Husted; Damian & Valori, LLP ; a Florida limited liability partnership; and Mintz Levin Cohn Ferris Glovsky and Popeo, P.C., Appellees. Case No. 2D17-1433 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed September 21, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
